141
Chapter 12 - Self-respect 

Loving Others, Loving Oneself
     MANY WOMEN STRUGGLE WITH FEELINGS OF SELF-WORTH AND VALUE IN GOD'S SIGHT. AS IN OTHER PORTIONS OF THIS BOOK, THE PASSAGES USED MAY NOT HAVE BEEN WRITTEN SPECIFICALLY FOR OR TO WOMEN, BUT THEY ARE APPLICABLE TO THEM IN THEIR SEARCH FOR AN UNDERSTANDING OF HOW GOD VIEWS THEM AS HIS CREATION AND HOW THEY SHOULD VIEW THEMSELVES AND OTHERS.
